DOC.brief_title: Effect Antioxidant Cocktail Beta-thalassemia/Hb E Patients
DOC.detailed_description: 60 case beta-thalassemia/Hb E patient . All patient diagnose hemoglobin type beta-thalassemia/Hb E disease receive blood transfusion treatment least 3 month prior study . The study randomize control trial design treatment antioxidant cocktail . The antioxidant cocktail consist vitamin E 400 IU/day , curcuminoids 500 mg/day , N-acetylcysteine 200 mg/day deferiprone 50 mg/kg/day . All patient receive antioxidant cocktail daily 12 month . The patient regularly follow analyzed biochemical parameter every two month treatment withdrawal 3 month .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 1850 year 2. hemoglobin level 69 g/dL screen visit 3. WHO performance status grade 02 4. sign inform consent prior study entry . 1. receive iron chelator blood transfusion . 2. pregnancy breastfeed 3. receive drug except folic acid least 30 day study .
